USER QUERY: When any of the LivingRoom controllers are physically pressed to Fast On (DFON) during the overnight period (22:00–06:00), dim all controllers' backlights to a low night level.

__BEGIN_NUCORE_ROUTINE__
{
  "routine": {
    "id": 101,
    "name": "Night-mode dim on physical FastOn",
    "parent": 0,
    "comment": "When any controller receives a physical Fast On during night, set backlights low",
    "if": [
      { "(": 1 },
        { "==": { "device": "71 5F 2E 6", "control": "DFON" } },
        { "or": 1 },
        { "==": { "device": "71 5F 2E 7", "control": "DFON" } },
        { "or": 1 },
        { "==": { "device": "71 5F 2E 8", "control": "DFON" } },
      { ")": 1 },
      { "and": 1 },
      { "from": { "time": "22:00", "to": { "time": "06:00", "day": 1 } } }
    ],
    "then": [
      { "device": "71 5F 2E 6", "command": "BL", "parameters": [ { "name": "n/a", "value": 16, "uom": "25", "precision": 0 } ] },
      { "device": "71 5F 2E 7", "command": "BL", "parameters": [ { "name": "n/a", "value": 16, "uom": "25", "precision": 0 } ] },
      { "device": "71 5F 2E 8", "command": "BL", "parameters": [ { "name": "n/a", "value": 16, "uom": "25", "precision": 0 } ] }
    ],
    "else": [],
    "reasoning": "Group COC triggers for DFON on any of the three controllers and restrict to the overnight period using a time-range schedule. Then set each controller's Backlight (BL) to a low integer value (16) using uom 25 so all panels are dimmed for night use."
  }
}
__END_NUCORE_ROUTINE__
